title: Darksiders Warmastered Edition

notes: The game starts up and can be played with keyboard and mouse. For some reason it skips cinematics. My steam controller is only picked up, when i launch the game from big picture mode. But with the controller connected the game crashes after selecting a save game
title: Darksiders Warmastered Edition

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon R9 200 Series (HAWAII, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.14-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: runs out of the box, maximal settings, high fps with mouse/keyboard in menus and gameplay (Gold) --- but using a steam controller the game crashes rarely on starting or loading a game, and crashes ALWAYS on trying to open the in-game menus with the steam controller (with keyboard it works) ---  BUT switching controller device k/m<-> steam controller while game running doesn't work
title: Darksiders Warmastered Edition

notes: Seems to work out-of-the-box now with 3.16-1. Can run in 4k res with highest settings.
title: Darksiders Warmastered Edition

notes: Game works out of the box. Cutscenes don't play, they just skip. Game logs have this message: No video and audio track could be set for specified video file.
title: Darksiders Warmastered Edition

notes: Everything works great except videos don't play. There's some manual steps to fix it but you need to locate a specific version of mfplat.dll: https://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=version&iId=36588
title: Darksiders Warmastered Edition

notes: Games run normally. When pressing start to enter menu, game freezes. Cinematic Videos are skipped.
title: Darksiders Warmastered Edition

notes: Game freeze when pressing start to display pause menu. Cinematics are skipped.
title: Darksiders Warmastered Edition

notes: Runs very well at 60 fps!
title: Darksiders Warmastered Edition

notes: The game starts, I can enter the options but unexpectedly closes
title: Darksiders Warmastered Edition

notes: The game starts, I can enter the options but unexpectedly closes. Putting -windowed on Launch parameters and leaving the predefined options prevents the game from closing. Played full screen, with keyboard and mouse, very good behavior
title: Darksiders Warmastered Edition

notes: Opens to a "game crashed" window
title: Darksiders Warmastered Edition

notes: Before updating to latest beta version of proton and pre-410 nvidia drivers this game would load. Now it loads and I can play it. The graphics aren't quite as dynamic as the windows version and there are some issues with some menu elements not showing. Also when in-game, the pause menu seems to break with no items and just a scrolling background texture. Having said that, the area I just played through did work just fine with perfect sound, steam controller, and visuals.
title: Darksiders Warmastered Edition
